setting_value: Hello! I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience in crafting robust and scalable web applications. My journey started with a simple curiosity about how websites work, which has now evolved into a career where I solve complex problems with code.
I build accessible, pixel-perfect, and performant web experiences.
Custom websites built with modern technologies like React, Next.js, and PHP. Fast, secure, and SEO-friendly.
Cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter or React Native that provide a native experience on iOS and Android.
User-centered design that looks beautiful and works perfectly. Wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups.
